reviews.review: 18年买的游戏，挺怀念的，当时我的电脑还是渣渣，玩这游戏勉强能达到60帧，当时我还基本只玩绝地求生（玩绝地求生帧数只有25帧左右，真不知道当时我是怎么坚持过来的），库存基本就是几个游戏，就是现在说的98党吧，那时的我买游戏都是先看最低配置，然后再疯狂对比自己的电脑配置，但又看的不是很懂，就放弃了很多其他优秀的游戏，能买到这个游戏都是因为我刚好有个好友玩这个游戏，到现在拥有了更多的游戏，想想都得感谢当时的好友引路，让我接触到更多好玩的游戏啊。[spoiler] 我发觉说了那么多竟然都没有这游戏的好玩之处，哈哈，反倒是怀念起来自己游玩steam的过程了[/spoiler]

Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

I'm usually not a person prone to hyperbolize, but Portal 2 is, after almost a decade, still one of the best games ever made. It's not easy to follow up to a groundbreaking game like Portal, but this sequel is really something special.

Я достаточно давно знаком с серией игр Portal. В детстве я играл в неё. Где-то в начале этой осени я открыл для себя Half-life. В отличии от своей предыдущей игры данная не такая короткая, в ней есть более большой сюжет и много любимого мной чёрного юмора. Уже в 100 раз перепрошёл этот шедевр, советую и вам. :)

I bought this for a co-op to play with my wife. Which we love a lot already. Then we found out that there is a single player mode. There is a very long story, with greatest characters we've ever seen in games that forces us to invests hours in it because we care dearly about them.
This is once of the best game I've ever play. Truly a master peace.

Recomendo que jogue o primeiro jogo para entender melhor os diálogos que acontecem, NÃO PERCAM OS DIÁLOGOS! São parte fundamental do jogo, eu me diverti muito mais enquanto jogava quando prestava atenção no que a GlaDos e o Wheatney(?) diziam. Jogabilidade muito boa, desafios mentais muito bons e que rendem boas horas de diversão. Recomendo demais!!

Played on Xbox 360. Loved it then, love it still!

PLAY THE 1ST GAME FIRST! I played this game for the first time a long time ago on the Xbox 360. I only got to chapter 4 or so, and never got to the good parts. I'm glad I really took time to beat it because this game, the game play, the writing, and the music is FANTASTIC. It's probably my 3rd favorite game of all time behind Minecraft, obviously, and Destiny 2. 10/10 Very Portaly.
